channel.title: Help with mb spec

item.title: Help with mb spec
item.dc:creator: @legend_the_hero legend the hero
item.description:
@legend_the_hero wrote:

ok heres my d bow code:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15156 && specialAmount <= 49) { // dark bow specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy left."); } if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15156 && specialAmount >= 50) { // dark bow startAnimation(426); startAnimation(426); darkbow(); specialAmount -= 50; }

what would i do to make mb spec?

this is my current 1 but it gives me 12 errors:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && specialAmount > 74 && specOn && AttackingOn2.currentHealth > 0){ specialAtk(true, 75, 256, 1074); hitDiff = misc.random(maxRangeHit()) + misc.random(3); rangeGFX(75, 249); rangeGFX(95, 249); specAttack(); actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); usingSpecial = true; }

Read full topic
